replies.message: Hi Abdul. How can we help you? -Chantal

***Please help*** We are trying to get the "m" in "music" of our page name capitalized and every time we put an appeal in for a name change we are getting an error message from FB(seems like a glitch). We are an established record label and made the mistake early on. We can provide you with any documents/paperwork you may need. We are just trying to get our identity on FB fixed. Hoping someone from FB can message us and not a link to where it can be done because the link is giving us the error message. Thanks in advance.
how i can generate like on my page just for fun
